contact.visa: Stamp 1G Visa, may work full-time without an Employment Permit

Ira Ivanova.summary: Experienced QA Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Strong professional skills in various types of testing Web, Mobile, and Desktop Applications. Proven record of successful implementation of test strategies. Experienced in overall QA process development and implementation.

responsibilities: Led testing efforts for intricate client-server applications
Executed comprehensive testing across different levels (Unit, Integration, System, Acceptance) using industry-standard methodologies
Proficient in backend testing with Postman, ensuring API functionality and data integrity
Designed and implemented effective test plans, cases, and scenarios to detect software defects and ensure optimal performance
Mentored junior team members, providing guidance on testing techniques and tools
Traffic sniffer (Charles, Fiddler, Proxyman)
Checking the correct operation of the specified application parameters (JSON)
Developed and executed testing plans and strategies for client-server applications
Conducted testing across various levels to ensure software quality
Participated in design reviews and feature development planning
Reported defects and maintained quality standards within the QA team
Managed project risks and provided task status reports for release
Provided feedback and suggestions for testing process improvements
Reported on testing results
Conducted functional manual testing of client-server applications to ensure their performance and reliability
Participated in gathering and analyzing requirements to align testing efforts with project objectives
Assisted in localization, documentation, and support of defects to facilitate their resolution
Designed and wrote test documentation using Allure, ensuring comprehensive coverage of testing scenarios
Provided detailed reports on the results of testing, highlighting key findings and recommendations for improvement
Interacted with clients to understand their needs and preferences
Conducted market research to identify trends and opportunities
Conducted assortment research to optimize product offerings
Maintained records of expenses and income to ensure financial stability
Negotiated with landlords to secure favorable rental agreements
Worked closely with suppliers to maintain inventory levels and ensure product availability
Interacted with tax authorities to ensure compliance with regulations
Interacted with banks to manage financial transactions and accounts
Developed and implemented a product promotion strategy to increase visibility and sales

education.notes: Gaining a 3rd level qualification remotely (graduating in 2025), driven by limited choices back home. Yet, real passion is pursuing a career in IT.
